Body:
request = Request('GET', b'/', headers)
assert request.declares_json() is expected_result
pytest.mark.parametrize('headers,expected_result', [[[(b'Content-Type',
    b'application/json')], True], [[(b'Content-Type',
    b'application/problem+json')], True], [[(b'Content-Type',
    b'application/json; charset=utf-8')], True], [[], False], [[(
    b'Content-Type', b'application/xml')], False]])
